alert.note: Alert for Loess Plains (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 28 at 1:26PM CDT until April 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 219... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 219. * TIMING...Noon until 8 PM CDT Saturday. * WIND...North with gusts to 45mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
